root.name: Cluefinders: Math Adventures - Mystery of the Himalayas
root.description: OverviewCluefinders: Math Adventures - Mystery of the Himalayas is an educational game developed by The Learning Company and published by both The Learning Company (PC version) and Br√∏derbund Software (Mac version).PlotIn the Himalayan Mountains there is a village which has had 24 of it's priceless treasures stolen. The team known as The Cluefinders are called in to help recover the artifacts and catch the thief.Throughout the adventure the Cluefinders find clues that seem to indicate that multiple people were responsible for the thefts, however they eventually find out that there is someone else pulling the strings and forced these people to hide the treasures.Finally at the end of the adventure it is found that a Yeti, who ends up being the student to the village elder dressed in a Yeti costume is behind the thefts.
